channel.title: Got All CB Formula's how can i change it to say Combat Level: 138 instead of 126
channel.description:
ok so, what im tryying to say is -
i have all the formula's so when i go up to somebody with maxed skills and got 99 summoning ect, they have 138 combat.
and when im on the level 138 account, how do i make it so that in the tab to show if ur unarmed, and like were u can change ur fight status e.g (kick, punch) to get diffrent xp.
how do i make it show Combat Level: 138 instead of 126, i can't find it anywhere!!!!
this is project insainty.

item.title: Got All CB Formula's how can i change it to say Combat Level: 138 instead of 126
item.dc:creator: @ZinG1337 ZinG1337
item.description:
@ZinG1337 wrote:

oh i see what you mean, ok thankyou, it just multiplying the current level and adding a few extra thankyou, ill get back to you to know how i go

EDIT: Its not working :L, ive hooked it to the level [23], witch is summoning, put the int in there but nothing changed
